main: Seitheric energy pours out from the top of the grand tower. It stretches across the land like a tide of darkness, swallowing every demon and demonkin it came across. The volatile nature of this ritual meant a kickback was inevitable. The sheer mass of Demonic energies being pulled by the Grand Tower carves rivers into the ground. Mountains are rent and shattered to dust. Entire settlements are uprooted from the ground. The sky overhead turns to night as pure darkness envelops the sky. The sea burns and the air turns to fire. Nearly every living thing above ground is mangled unrecognisably.

The Society of Blue uses their massive reserves of knowledge and resources to rebuild from scratch, hailing you as a god in their new religion. The world that is left is in abject ruination, but not unsalvageable, and as such, humanity perseveres.
